welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pistoia, Italy! Get ready to be charmed by this medieval city known for its beautiful architecture, lively markets, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pistoia has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
